exceptions.exn: In environment worlds : Type R : Relation worlds po_R : PreOrder Krelation J : Join worlds SA : SeparationAlgebra worlds dSA : DownwardsClosedSeparationAlgebra worlds Unable to unify "ResidualSeparationAlgebra ?M2113" with "forall m1 m2 m n1 n2 : worlds, join m1 m2 m -> n1 <= m1 -> n2 <= m2 -> exists n : worlds, join n1 n2 n /\\ n <= m".

original: apply Build_ResidualSeparationAlgebra. intros n. destruct (residue_exists n) as [m [H1 H2]]. exists m. split. - apply H1. - apply all_increasing.
